# Phoenix Components

## Scripts

**start Storybook**

```shell
yarn start
```

**build**

```shell
yarn build
```

**lint**

```shell
yarn lint
```

**lint fix**

```shell
yarn lint:fix
```

**build storybook**

```shell
yarn build-storybook
```

## Usage

**install**

```shell
yarn add git+ssh://git@github.com:WindoTech/phoenix-components.git#master
```

**import**

```javascript
import { Button } from 'phoenix-components';
```
